action.action-desc: Mr. Tiberi (for himself, Mr. Neal, Mr. Reed, Mr. Kelly of Pennsylvania, Mr. Meehan, Mr. McKinley, Mr. Kind, Mr. Higgins of New York, Mr. Smith of Missouri, Mr. Paulsen, Mr. Blumenauer, Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois, Mr. Thompson of California, Mr. Pascrell, Ms. Sewell of Alabama, Mr. Larson of Connecticut, Ms. Sánchez, Mr. Turner, Mr. Joyce of Ohio, Mr. Johnson of Ohio, Mr. Stivers, and Mr. Renacci) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the new markets tax credit, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the New Markets Tax Credit Extension Act of 2017.

section.header: Permanent extension of new markets tax credit

paragraph.text: Subparagraph (G) of section 45D(f)(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking for each of calendar years 2010 through 2019 and inserting for calendar year 2010 and each calendar year thereafter.
Section 45D(f)(3) of such Code is amended by striking the last sentence.

subsection.text: Subsection (f) of section 45D of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

subparagraph.text: In the case of any calendar year beginning after 2016, the dollar amount in paragraph (1)(G) shall be increased by an amount equal to—

clause.text: the cost-of-living adjustment determined under section 1(f)(3) for the calendar year, determined by substituting calendar year 2000 for calendar year 1992 in subparagraph (B) thereof.

subparagraph.text: Any increase under subparagraph (A) which is not a multiple of $1,000,000 shall be rounded to the nearest multiple of $1,000,000.

subsection.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 38(c)(4) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating clauses (v) through (xi) as clauses (vi) through (xii), respectively, and
by inserting after clause (iv) the following new clause:

clause.text: the credit determined under section 45D, but only with respect to credits determined with respect to qualified equity investments (as defined in section 45D(b)) initially made after December 31, 2016,

paragraph.text: Except as provided in paragraph (2), the amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2016.

The amendments made by subsection (c) shall apply to credits determined with respect to qualified equity investments (as defined in section 45D(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986) initially made after December 31, 2016.
